title: Not receiving chests for S
body:
Hello,

Since I have returned to league of legends about a couple months ago, I have yet to receive a reward chest for getting an S- or higher in the normal summoners rift or even ranked summoners rift game modes. Not sure what is going on. Someone please help! 

-C

replies.body: Keep in mind that you can only receive 1 chest per champion, per season and you do need to own that champion (not free to play). If that's not the reason why, let me know which champion you played and I can look into that for ya!
